_description: An erotic carol with double entendre — six quatrains (aabb) and burden: ‘Podynges at nyght & podynges at none / Were nat for podynges the world were clene done’

CULAdd7350.First Lines:
I pray yow maydens euerychoneTell me wherfore ye make so grete
                    mone…
CULAdd7350.Last Lines:
…but & we lyve another yere as plese god we maywe will
                    haue eche of us one what so euer we pray
